title: Plate, "The Reign of Workers and Peasants Will Be Without End", 1920
markings: underside: Imperial Porcelain Factory mark obscured by green enamel oval; hammer, sickle, cog, 1920 hand-painted in blue overglaze
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Circular; with red star and the inscription, in Russian, "The reign of workers and peasants will be without end" around border; in the center a white partial orb, a hammer and sickle, and the inscription, in Russian, "Commune"

tombstone.epitaph:
Plate, "The Reign of Workers and Peasants Will Be Without End", 1920.
1920. Porcelain, enamel, gilding. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-14.
